The Shanxi Zhangjiawan Coal Mine is an underground coal mine located in the southern suburbs of Datong City, Shanxi Province

operators: Shanxi Coal Transportation & Sales Group Zhangjiawan Coal Industry Co Ltd
web_search_companies.notes: The mine is operated by Shanxi Coal Transportation & Sales Group, which is a state-owned enterprise.
